content: the district court in ljubljana made a decision on october 7 2021 regarding a case involving parties whose names are omitted the case lasted for 8 months and 23 days from january 15 2021 to october 7 2021 the court fee for the case was 936 eur and the heirs are responsible for paying half of the costs the final resolution of the case involves dividing the deceased persons assets which include unpaid pension benefits funds in their personal bank account and several real estate properties the assets have a total value of 235000 euros and will be divided equally between the deceased persons son and daughter the decision was based on the inheritance act and the civil procedure act the court also provided instructions for lodging an appeal including the time limit and requirements for the appeal process

metadata.subject_of_succession: unpaid pension benefits, funds on a personal bank account, real estate 1, 1/5 of real estate 2, real estates 3 and 4
metadata.relationship_between_parties: son and daughter of the deceased
